name: Extreme runner
description:
Description

A short simple game of an extreme rooftop parkour runner. Dodge obstacles by sliding, jumping and moving around them. Kick objects off the roof to gain extra points. Try to reach the final objective.

Controls

A to turn left
D to turn right
Space to jump
C to slide

Objective

Reach the end of the level obtaining as much points as you can

Feedback

Please leave your feedback in the comments below the game, it helps out a lot!
